title: Why do you take your life for granted? - Quora

response.answer_text: Do I take my life for granted? Of course, NO! I probably just have 50 years or less to live life here and then what? Poof, gone just like that, I doubt if anyone would even care to ask about my whereabouts after that. 50 years is a very short time and people should not take their life for granted. Everyone should live life to the fullest, I know it’s easier said than doing but to be honest I believe they should enjoy each and every moment of their life. Don’t take life for granted, you never know when it will come to a sudden stop.
